author: francescobrivio
body:
#### PR description:
This PR is the backport of #33142 to add the Ecal supercluster parameters to run1_mc GTs, data GTs and run4_mc GTs.

The GT diffs are as follow:
**Run 1 design**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/112X_mcRun1_design_v1/112X_mcRun1_design_v2

**Run 1 realistic**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/112X_mcRun1_realistic_v1/112X_mcRun1_realistic_v2

**Run 1 heavy ion**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/112X_mcRun1_HeavyIon_v1/112X_mcRun1_HeavyIon_v2

**Run 1 proton-heavy ion**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/112X_mcRun1_pA_v2/112X_mcRun1_pA_v3

**Run 2 HLT RelVals**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/112X_dataRun2_HLT_relval_v3/112X_dataRun2_HLT_relval_v4

**Run 2 HI HLT RelVals**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/112X_dataRun2_HLT_relval_HI_v2/112X_dataRun2_HLT_relval_HI_v3

**Run 3 data (express)**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/112X_dataRun3_Express_v2/112X_dataRun3_Express_v3

**Run 3 data (prompt)**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/112X_dataRun3_Prompt_v2/112X_dataRun3_Prompt_v3

**Phase 2 realistic**
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/112X_mcRun4_realistic_v6/112X_mcRun4_realistic_v7



#### PR validation:
A technical test was performed:
`runTheMatrix.py -l limited,138.1,138.2,140.0 --ibeos -j 9`

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
This PR is the backport of #33142
title: Update GTs with Ecal supercluster parameters [11_2_X]
